sect1.title: GUI
sect1.para: The shows a screen shot of the Grid Engine plug-in GUI page for pod-console.

Using the plug-ins GUI (see. ) users are able to specify a number of workers and an GE queue. PoD provides a default GE job script. Advanced users a free to change it in order to tune PoD for a specific environment or tasks.

sect1.title: CLI
sect1.para: For users convenience PoD provides a command line interface. One can also use PoD CLI to submit PoD jobs, instead of using GUI. Meet the CLI documentation and check out the reference for further information.

sect2.title: GE in PoD User Defaults
sect2.para: There are GE plug-in options in the PoD user defaults (see ), which you can use to tune the plug-in.

sect2.title: GE Options File
sect2.para: PoD also supports an GE option file. If you want to provide some additional Grid Engine options to your PoD jobs submitted to OE cluster, to select some specific resource or something like that, than PoD gives you this possibility via an GE option file. See the option for more information.
